page.title: 07THE BUTCHER'S IN SUDBURY
page.content: The{Butcher's Shop}is owned by {Mr.Wild.} It is situated in School Lane. Outside the shop, on its front is a{late Victorian facade}with shutters made of wood. Mr.Wild sells many different kinds of meat including pork, beef, turkey, liver and ham. Mr.Wild also owns a{slaughter house down School Lane, where he kills animals to provide the meat. Mrs.Wild makes sausages and pork pies. The butcher sells all sorts of food, not just meat. These items include cheeses, milk (various sorts), fruit juices and eggs.
